::KitKat::

She groaned in her sleep and dreamed of defeating the maximals. Her 
body trembled as she slept. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Tarantulas coughed as he made his way into the smokey clearing 
where the 
> survivors of he Cave explosion and Phobia's crash rested. He could 
call Black 
> Aracnia and tell them that HE had found them....but first he would 
talk to 
> them.
>     He made his way into the clearing a looked to the bots. "Well, 
arent we 
> having good luck today? Hehehhehehehehe!" He chuckled. Then the 
spider 
> approached Kitkat.
>     "Commander Kitkat, I am acting as Ambassador for my fraction 
right now. 
> And, my fraction is wondering if you are or are not going to join 
us?"
